Dein Chefkoch-Team

HOW DOES CROWDFARMING WORK?

- Help Farmers plan their harvest
Adopt a tree, an animal or part of a garden, receive fresh food cultivated just for you straight from the farmers while fighting food waste. You can also buy by boxes in our Farmers Market.

- We are not an online supermarket
We don't resell food: our added-value lies in building a platform which provides logistics and customer service, so that our Farmers can sell their crops directly to you.

- Win-Win-Winner
Our economic model is based on a formula that we've dubbed "Win-Win-Winner": it's good for the Farmer, it's good for society, and together we can improve the environment.  

- Lovers of ugly fruit and haters of waste
CrowdFarming fights against food waste at the source thanks to adoptions. When you adopt something, you allow the Farmer to grow a crop knowing that someone will consume it. Moreover, the Farmers at CrowdFarming don't throw away "ugly fruit", as they abide to product-quality criteria instead of aesthetic-ones.

- Open-minded, socially responsible
As food-consumers, we ask ourselves questions beyond the taste of food: do we only want organic-certified products available for purchase? What is more environment-friendly: a can or a glass bottle? How much water is needed to produce certain foods? We like undertaking these decisions with an open mind, and while being true to our values.

- Multi-local mindset versus globalisation
We support an inclusive culture that favours social and cultural exchanges, seeking not to impose global, but multi-local solutions. Buy at the source to enjoy at the destination.

A propos de Boissons Heintz:
Depuis 100 ans, la société Boissons Heintz est active dans la vente et la distribution de boissons tels que les bières, eaux, softs, jus, vins, alcools, cafés, etc. Ayant commencé en tant fabricant de limonade et embouteilleur de bière, la société commercialise aujourd’hui plus de 3500 articles dans le Grand-Duché du Luxembourg.
 
Environ 2000 clients actifs sont livrés régulièrement par le biais d’une flotte de plus de 25 camions et camionnettes qui circulent tous les jours dans la région.
 
Les activités:
En outre de son activité principale, la vente et distribution de boissons, la société Boissons Heintz offre des services complémentaires à ses clients :
 
Dégustations et commercialisation de vins fins via l'enseigne « Le Cellier »
"Le Cellier" est l'enseigne de Boissons Heintz pour la vente et la distribution de vins fins et se situe, comme sa société mère, à Hosingen. Il présente le domaine des vins fins d'Europe (France, Luxembourg, Allemagne, Italie, Espagne, Portugal), mais aussi de l'Australie, de l'Amérique du Sud (Argentine et Chili) et de l'Afrique du Sud.  "Le Cellier" vous garantit une bonne conservation des centaines de vins mondiaux dans une cave à vin climatisée. D’un simple vin de table au vin le plus prestigieux - toutes vos idées budgétaires et gastronomiques seront satisfaites.
 
Vente au comptant au « Drink Center » à Marnach
Le Drink-Center est situé au bloc B de la Nordstrooss Shopping Mile à Marnach.
Des parkings exclusivement réservés pour notre clientèle se trouvent directement à l'entrée.
La filiale est ouverte tous les jours du lundi au jeudi de 10h00-18h00, le vendredi 10h00-19h00, le samedi de 09h00-18h00 et le dimanche de 09h00-13h00. Chaque client y trouve un choix important de boissons : bières, eaux minérales, boissons rafraîchissantes, vins, alcools, verres, accessoires de boissons etc.
 
Situation:
La société Boissons Heintz est situé au Z.A.E.R. (zone d'activité économique régional) à Hosingen.
L’équipe de Boissons Heintz se compose aujourd’hui d’environ 70 collaborateurs dont 40% font partie de l’équipe depuis plus de 10 ans.

Mit der Betty Bossi App hast du für jeden Anlass das passende Rezept zur Hand – unsere täglichen Inspirationen aus der beliebten Betty Bossi Zeitung und die exklusiven Backtipps zum Wochenende machen das Kochen und Geniessen zum Vergnügen!

FUNKTIONEN
- Über 5000 kostenlose Rezepte: Mit über 60 Jahren Erfahrung findest du bei uns die grösste Auswahl an leckeren Koch- und Backrezepten aus der kulinarischen Welt der Schweiz. Als Abonnentin/Abonnent erhältst du Zugang zu weiteren exklusiven Rezepten.
- Kuratierte Empfehlungen: Deine Familie ist auf dem Weg und du weisst nicht, was du kochen sollst? Lass dich von unserem Tagesrezept oder von einer der zahlreichen Kategorien inspirieren!
- Intelligente Suche: Du hast eine Idee oder du fragst dich, ob man aus deinem Kühlschrankinhalt etwas Leckeres auf den Tisch zaubern kann? Such einfach nach Begriffen oder nutze den Filter und finde in Windeseile ein Rezept, das garantiert gelingt.
- Kochmodus: Wenn es ans Eingemachte geht, unterstützen dich unsere mehrfach erprobten Kochanleitungen bei der Zubereitung. Damit dein Smartphone stets sauber bleibt, kannst du durch Anstupsen zwischen den Schritten wechseln.
- Eigene Notizen: Halte deine eigenen Ideen und Rezeptanpassungen ganz einfach mit unserer Notizfunktion fest. 
- Schnelles Teilen: Du hast keine Zeit, um selber einzukaufen? Die benötigten Zutaten zu jedem Rezept lassen sich in Sekundenschnelle über Facebook, WhatsApp oder einen Messenger deiner Wahl mit deinem Partner, deiner Partnerin oder Freunden teilen.
Rezeptbuch: Speichere einfach deine Lieblingsrezepte und baue eine beachtliche Bibliothek auf, die nicht den halben Küchenschrank einnimmt. Und wenn dir ein Rezept aus unserem Magazin besonders gefällt, kannst du dieses ebenfalls ganz leicht per Scanner hinzufügen.

SUPPORT
Wir arbeiten stetig daran, unsere App noch weiter zu verbessern und freuen uns daher immer über FEEDBACK! Schreib ein E-Mail an bbapp@bettybossi.ch oder wende dich an unseren Kunden-Service: +41 (0) 44 209 19 29 (Schweizer Festnetztarif), Montag–Freitag von 8 bis 17 Uhr.

WEITERE INFORMATIONEN

THE BASICS: 
1. Yummy and healthy recipes, using natural ingredients.
2. I love to replace „bad“ ingredients of classic recipes - for example cane sugar or white flour - with more healthy alternatives. Therefore we can still eat dessert. But we get important nutrients, vitamins and minerals at the same time. The result? Food and sugar cravings will say goodbye and you’ll start feeling happy with your healthy diet. 
3. Quick & easy! I know, it’s not possible to spend hours in the kitchen every day. Most recipes are therefore quick, easy & ideal for take-away.
4. All recipes are perfect for a fit lifestyle. Huge amounts of fats or sugar (alternatives) are therefore not part of the Pam app. It’s my job to have a flat tummy & toned thighs.. and that’s not even that hard!
5. Take responsibility! If you want to feel amazing, you have to know about what you eat, the quality of the ingredients and how your dish was prepared. You should not give the responsibility about your health to somebody else. That means: less processed foods, more homemade meals!

Envie de voyager from « Japan to Peru » ? Alors il est temps de se faire plaisir et de commander sur l’app Côté Sushi en quelques clics.

Côté Sushi est une enseigne spécialiste de la cuisine nikkei d’inspiration japonaise et péruvienne. Encore peu connu en France, l’art culinaire nikkei est le fruit de la rencontre entre deux cultures gastronomiques : la cuisine japonaise, technique et précise, et la cuisine péruvienne, exotique et épicée.
Chez Côté Sushi, la cuisine est pop et vibrante. Colorées et exotiques, les créations font pétiller le palais et l’amènent hors des sentiers battus pour un voyage express entre le Japon et le Pérou.

L’application Côté Sushi, c’est quoi :
Histoire de vous faciliter la vie, Côté Sushi a imaginé une application ergonomique ; tout d’abord saisissez votre adresse de livraison ou choisissez le shop où vous souhaitez retirer votre commande. Ensuite, découvrez toute notre carte et ajoutez au panier vos recettes préférées, puis sélectionnez l’heure à laquelle vous souhaitez être livrée ou vous souhaitez la récupérer. Puis l’équipe Côté Sushi s’occupe de tout, vous pourrez suivre la progression de votre commande en temps réel et vous serez livré en 30 minutes.

A chaque commande vous serez récompensé grâce à notre programme de fidélité, faire partie de la team des nikkeilovers permet d’obtenir de nombreux avantages ! Vous pourrez les retrouver et les utiliser directement dans votre panier à chaque nouvelle commande. Mais ce n’est pas tout, vous pourrez également découvrir des actualités exclusives, des offres inédites et bien d’autres choses sur notre app…

Traversant les frontières et interprété par les toques de grands restaurants étoilés comme par les chefs de tables street-food, le Nikkei s’est progressivement affirmé en tant qu’identité culinaire en s’érigeant au rang de véritable tendance gastronomique à l’échelle mondiale. La marque collabore aujourd’hui avec de grands chefs, des artistes et des illustrateurs tel que : Christophe Adam, Enrique Casarrubias, Chic des Plantes !, Maison Plantin et Laura Deleuze afin de proposer des plats toujours plus gourmands et raffinés.

Elle est aujourd’hui présente dans toute la France et à Luxembourg.

Bonne dégustation et à très vite !

Scan your wine and get the ideal aeration time for an optimal tasting!

The Aveine mobile application:

- Gives a precise recommendation on the aeration time* of your wine. 

- Gives technical information about the scanned wine, such as its origin, the grape varieties, its colour, its alcohol content or its service temperature. 

- Has an interactive map showing all the ambassadeurs (bars, wine bars, restaurants, hotels, wineries) of Aveine which will allow you to discover the aerator to which this application is connected.

To determine the aeration time required for your wine:

- The Aveine mobile application uses its own database. It now contains 10,000 references. It will be enhanced as users scan wines with the Aveine mobile application. 

- Whenever possible, it is the producers themselves who indicate the aeration time they consider most suitable for optimal consumption of their wines. In addition, Aveine works with sommeliers, oenologists and wine professionals to determine the ideal time. 

If the wine is not in the database: 

- An algorithm developed by Aveine is used. According to some elements collected on the scan of the label (grape variety, vintage, origin), the algorithm will look in the database for similar wines, and propose an aeration based on these results. 

- To refine this setting, Aveine suggests that users answer a few questions to guide the algorithm. The absence notification is then transmitted, and bots will search for information about this wine. This information is then validated manually, and the wine is added to the database.

This application works with the Smart Wine Aerator, by Aveine, which allows you to aerate the wine precisely and instantly. More information on Aveine's website: www.aveine.paris

*The aeration time is an open bottle equivalent

CellarTracker is the world's largest collection of wine reviews, tasting notes and personal stories from people who love wine — now available for iPhone and iPad!

• Read & Write Wine Reviews •
Find over 3.4 million wines, read more than 9.4 million tasting notes (community and professional) for great recommendations, and join a community of over 689,000 users to share your opinions. Fully integrated with professional reviews from Antonio Galloni, Stephen Tanzer, Allen Meadows, Jancis Robinson, Decanter and more (separate subscriptions may be required).

• Manage Your Collection •
Use our online cellar management tool to track your collection, see its value, and much more. Users are currently managing 122 million bottles and counting!

• Label Recognition •
Search for a wine by taking a photo of the label, or quickly capture photos and notes of multiple wines for later reference. Access your entire history of captured labels to remember what you've been drinking.

• Scan Barcodes •
Easily scan UPC/EAN barcodes on wines, as well as custom CellarTracker barcodes, to make cellar management a breeze. 

• Track Consumption History •
CellarTracker allows you to track what you've been drinking — from your cellar, a restaurant, winery or anywhere — and add your own tasting notes, ratings and label images.

This app requires internet connectivity to operate. Certain functionality, such as managing your cellar or tracking consumption history, require a free CellarTracker account. Optional paid CellarTracker accounts provide access to additional functionality, including automatic valuation. Some professional reviews require separate subscriptions to those publications to enable integration.

summary.label:
(What)
Goodness Groceries is a University of Luxembourg consumer study piloting a sustainable food shopping app in partnership with the Pall Center.  The app acts as a virtual shopping companion providing eco-responsible and ethical product information of selected food products. 
(How)
The app serves several functions. You can scan QR codes of selected food products in the shop or browse the product information at any time to learn more about the products and how they perform in different areas of sustainability. The information is based on self-assessments by the product suppliers. The assessment of indicators was developed by the Sustainable Food Practices team at the University of Luxembourg. Each product is awarded with indicators in the areas of Environment, Social well-being, Economic well-being and Good Governance. You can compare the selected food products and find out how they meet the different sustainability indicators. According to your own areas of interest, you can activate the indicators you are most keen to know about.
(Why)
The objective of the study is to assess how an app providing information about food products’ sustainability performance can be helpful with food choices, and if such a food shopping app can strengthen more sustainable consumption in the long-term. It also aims to understand what is important to consumers in terms of eco-responsible and ethical information, and in terms of their preferences for how to find out and learn about such qualities.  
(When)
The study is ongoing and has been approved by the University of Luxembourg’s Ethics Review Panel. 
(Where)
To participate you must be between 18-65 years old and a resident of Luxembourg. You must consent to taking part in the study by submitting your consent using an online form, link provided on our Help pages. In order to participate, you will need a Pall Center loyalty card, obtainable free of charge. Once your account is validated you will be given access to the app.

RestoLastMinute is the #1 application dedicated to help you find dining deals! RestoLastMinute offers last minute deals on a selection of the best restaurants. Get the most from Resto Minute app:

• Discover last minute offers close to you. 
• Search by Restaurant, Location, Type of cuisine… 
• Quickly view all available restaurants, the reduction, the setting, the location on the map and prices. 
• Book your table for free in a matter of seconds. 
• Stay informed about exclusive promotions and excellent deals. 

The Resto Last Minute application lets you book tables at restaurants, at a discount, without having to pick up the phone.

Let me know if this sounds familiar: You had big plans to cook a nice dinner but you’ve worked all day and the last thing you feel like doing is being creative in the kitchen. You’re sick of the usual take-away and delivery options and think it would be nice to go out to a restaurant. The last thing you want to do however, is wander around looking for a restaurant with a free table on a busy evening.

If this situation rings a bell, you need to check out the Resto Last Minute restaurant reservation website.

Resto Last Minute is a reservation engine for restaurants, with one important difference – you can only reserve for the current evening. At a glance, you can see how many tables are available at your chosen restaurant. Simply click ‘Book’ and you’re on your way. The best news – restaurants offering tables on Resto Last Minute do so at a discount. You get a reduction of 10-50% off your bill (excluding drinks, set menus, or other offers) simply for booking through the website.

The Resto Last Minute homepage easily shows available restaurants and discounts
Resto Last Minute is also great for those of us who want to try somewhere new, but need a little inspiration. When you click on a restaurant’s booking page, you can see sample menu items (with prices), photos of the interior and some of the dishes, a map of the restaurant’s location, and even the link to click through to its website, if you need more information.

Zooming in on an individual restaurant gives addition information Zooming in on an individual restaurant gives addition information.You can refine your search by location, type of cuisine, or, if you know exactly where you want to eat, you can search by Restaurant name as well.

When the folks at Resto Last Minute contacted us to test out their service, we were eager to see if it lived up to its potential. We decided to incorporate it into our Wednesday night ‘new restaurant challenge.
Wednesday morning, I visited the Resto Last Minute website and had plenty of options to choose from. There are many Brussels ‘institutions’ as well as restaurants I’m not (yet) familiar with. You can even book the Brussels Tram Experience through the website.

As for Resto Last Minute, we will definitely be using the website again. There were plenty of restaurants to choose from, the discounts are a great incentive, and it’s nice not having to call a restaurant and speak (in French or Dutch) with a harried server who may or may not get the booking right (especially when you have a last name like ours!).

RestoLastMinute is an online reservation website that immediately displays the available places in our partner restaurants for the evening itself, and this at the best price. Our partner restaurants put available places online every day and offer discounts on their menus.

You want to know if a food is compatible with fructose malabsorption, lactose, sorbitol or histamine intolerance? Or do you want to find out if it is gluten-free or suitable for irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)? Well, just ask Ingrid!  

Ingrid is your companion in everyday life with food intolerances or IBS. She gives you information about the tolerability, the amount of fructose, lactose, sorbitol, gluten, histamine or FODMAP in your food. 

 Download the free app and adjust your personal intolerances. Ingrid shows you all the important information. Her information is based on scientific findings and the food ratings are developed in collaboration with the experts of the Austrian charity “Society for Public Health”. Ingrid also shows you how well individual foods are tolerated by other people. So the community results let you see, how other patients tolerated that foods.  

*** Scientific data *** 
The data come from the “Society for Public Health” (nmi-Portal). This project has been researching intolerance for over 10 years and has created the basis for Ingrid with a special food intolerance database. The data used are all derived from scientific research, evaluated by patients and tested by nutrition experts.

  *** Community rating: Patients rate compatibility ***
 But Ingrid has a very special feature: Every user can document his/her personal tolerance of certain foods. These data are evaluated anonymously by Ingrid and made available to all other users. So you see not only the scientific nutritional data, but also the evaluation of thousands of other stakeholders. These two independent evaluation criteria allow you to make your perfect individual diet and finally enjoy your life again without discomfort.  

*** Only compatible foods *** 
Ingrid will also automatically show you an individualized list of foods that are tolerable. Because Ingrid is not about prohibitions, but about a better lifestyle. And that includes a balanced diet.  

*** Free and ad-free version *** 
Ingrid is free but shows ads. If that bothers you, you can make Ingrid ad-free with an in-app purchase. If you choose to buy "Ask Ingrid", you will be charged an annual 5.99 EUR including VAT via your iTunes account. Your approval is required for this.
The subscription is automatically renewed for the price of 5.99 EUR including VAT for another year, if it is not terminated within 24 hours before extension. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your iTunes preferences. For more information, please read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. (http://frag-ingrid.com/datenschutz/). 
 
*** If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, please send us an e-mail to ingrid@frag-ingrid.com. If you like Ingrid, we look forward to a positive rating.

How does it work?

Schlouk Map offers a map to see the bars around you thanks to geolocation. A search engine also allows you to find a bar that you already know.

Who adds the bars?

The app is collaborative : users add their favorite bars and indicate the following information:
* opening hours of the bars
